['Hit enemies are no longer disabled during the knockback [?]', 'Now applies the disarm instantly upon hit, instead of right after the knockback.', 'Increased disarm duration from 1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5 to 1.25/2/2.75/3.5/4.25/5/5.75/6.5.', ' Deafening Blast

['Invoker now starts with  Invoke Level 1 at the beginning of the game.', ' Invoke now has the standard 6/11/16 leveling.', 'Level 25 invoker (since he is now missing an ability level) now has an attribute bonus ability that grants 6 all stats.', 'Changed  Forged Spirit attack damage type from Chaos to Hero.']

['Increased  intelligence gain from 3.2 to 4.', " Aghanim's Scepter now also adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.", 'Increased  Alacrity attack damage and attack speed bonus from 20/30/40/50/60/70/80/90 to 30/40/50/60/70/80/90/100', '[U] Increased  Tornado duration at level 7 from 2.5 to 2.6 (formula still is 0.5 + (0.3 * Quas), but no longer capped at 2.5.)', ' Deafening Blast is now ground-targeted at max level again, instead of instant cast. [?]']

['Increased  intelligence gain from 2.5 to 3.2.', " Invoke no longer goes on cooldown if it only swaps the invoked abilities' slots.", 'Reduced  Sun Strike cooldown from 30 to 25.', ' Deafening Blast now turns into a non-targetable ability which releases blasts into every direction around Invoker when at max level (Quas, Wex and Exort at level 7).', 'The following abilities no longer ignore ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes:  Tornado,  EMP,  Chaos Meteor,  Sun Strike,  Ice Wall and  Deafening Blast']
[' Sun Strike damage now pierces spell immunity (spell immune units already counted towards the damage spread, but did not take the damage).']

['Changed damage formula from 70 + ((2 * Wex + Quas) * 15) to 70 + (3 * Wex * 15).', 'Damage range remains unchanged at 115-385.', 'Reduced flying vision radius from 1200 to 600.', ' Tornado
Changed damage formula from 70 + ((2 * Wex + Quas) * 15) to 70 + (3 * Wex * 15).
Damage range remains unchanged at 115-385.
Reduced flying vision radius from 1200 to 600.']

['Changed  Cold Snap damage from a constant 30 (60 initially) to 7/14/21/28/35/42/49, based on Quas level.', ' Forge Spirit no longer have 33% magic resistance.', ' Deafening Blast disarm is now dispellable by spell immunity.']
[' Ghost Walk slow no longer affects spell immune enemies.', 'Increased  EMP effect delay from 2.6 to 2.9.', ' Tornado is now dispellable.']
